channel.title: Comments on: BuT CaSTe iS nOT reLeVanT AnD eaTing AwaY mY MEriT….

item.title: By: Nostradamus_Polly301
item.dc:creator: Nostradamus_Polly301
item.description:
>What’s worse is the caste system was never so strict, it was the British government who took advantage of that system and made it the way it is today.
There's always one of these. Always.
item.content:encoded:
>What’s worse is the caste system was never so strict, it was the British government who took advantage of that system and made it the way it is today.

There’s always one of these. Always.
